member.name: F:HeyShelli.Shelli.OutputDataReceived
member.summary: Action to invoke when data is received.

member.name: F:HeyShelli.Shelli.ErrorDataReceived
member.summary: Action to invoke when error data is received.

member.name: P:HeyShelli.Shelli.WindowsShell
member.summary: Windows shell command. Defaults to 'cmd.exe'. For certain commands and environments, it may be necessary to change this value.

member.name: P:HeyShelli.Shelli.LinuxShell
member.summary: Linux shell command. Defaults to 'sh'. For certain commands and environments, you may need to change this. 'bash' is a common alternative.
